children.text:
Create a new ML Gateway token based on OpenAI.

Your token will be encrypted in your browser and will never arrive on our servers in plaintext.

curl -kv https://localhost/v1/chat/completions \ -H "Content-Type: {application/json" \ -H "Authorization: Bearer {{SecretTokenOutput.text}}" \ -d '{ "model": "gpt-3.5-turbo", "messages": [{"role": "user", "content": "Say AI Gateway"}], "temperature": 0.7 }'

children.placeholderText: Please enter OpenAI key above and click Encrypt
children.label: Your ML Secret Token

children.text: Your ML Secret Token was successfully generated. Please copy it and store in a safe place. Once you close this window you will not be able to recover it.

Welcome to the sample homepage of this SaaS App Template powered by Appsmith + Pocketbase. See all docs: Github This app includes:
  • User registration & login, logout, Email verification, Account updates
  • Dynamic menu, app name and logo from a config record in Pocketbase
  • Sample data: posts
Need help? I am available for paid customizations such as:
  • Adding payments
  • Adding social login
  • Custom data types, pages
Contact jakub@allthingsdemo.com Getting Started:
  1. Download Pocketbase, get migrations from here and put them into pb_migrations
  2. Run ./pocketbase migrate
  3. Run ./pocketbase serve &
  4. Download ngrok and point it to your pocketbase
  5. Fork this application. When forking it will ask you for a new Datasource Pocketbase URL. Point it to the ngrok URL
  6. Done! This app will run, you can now register users, see data
  7. Create your own collections, get them from Pocketbase, etc. - get inspired by the Homepage page, Queries -> Get Posts
